name: Hideout Besiege
description:
Hello players!

In this game you will have to besiege and storm trough criminal hideouts where you need to kill enemies, avoid spikes and move tactically around the level with only 2 buttons! Do you dare to take on the challenge of exterminating the evil organization and stealing their money?

Made for the 2 button game jam organized by 8 bits to infinity

Credits:

Coding+Art: Me!

VFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565

Music: 

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

SFX: Freesound.org

P.S. The song song "Running" from Joshua McLean inspired me not only with it's name (you have to run trough the hideouts ;p ) but it also made me feel like I doing some sort of important, tense action which led me into fantasizing about secret services and so on which in turn made me come up with the idea that became the game you can play!
